short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between the current Joomla issue and the Github issue tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When working with Joomla an testing patches, you have to switch between the Joomla issue tracker and The GitHub Joomla issue tracker. This will add a lot of tabs to the current browser. By using this extension switching is easy and you stay in the same tab of the browser. Also direct links to the sites are provided. As extra option you can quickly create a test image for testing purposes.
